title: How effective would King Edward VIII have been if he hadn't stepped down? - Quora
tags: King George VI of the United Kingdom

response.answer_text: If he was allowed to reign any longer than he did he would have been an unmitigated disaster as monarch. He was derelict in reading his boxes and following the advice of his ministers, was totally dominated by a woman who was beneath the standards of the Royal Family and this was all before World War II. King Edward VIII and Mrs. Simpson would not have had the same morale boosting effect that King George VI and Queen Elizabeth had.
